author: Xbox
description:
This is it.The journey is only a heartbeat away. REPLACED is officially releasing on March 12, 2026 on Xbox! Check out the Official Release Date Trailer for a first glimpse into this cinematic cyberpunk adventure.

Expose the sinister secrets of Phoenix Corporation as R.E.A.C.H., an AI trapped in a human body. Set in an alternate 1980s America scarred by nuclear catastrophe, navigate a dark cyberpunk thriller in this narrative-driven 2.5D platformer blending cinematic exploration with fluid, free-flow action. Replaced is releasing on Xbox Series X|S and Xbox Game Pass on March 12, 2026. Wishlist now: https://www.xbox.com/games/store/replaced/9mz1c8d26b7h

#REPLACED #replacedgame

author: Xbox
description:
Rocket League Season 21: from December 10 to March 11, it’s a full-on French takeover featuring the Parc de Paris Arena!

Hunt down an at-large thief in one of three Car Bodies in Season 21’s Rocket Pass Premium. The charmingly compact Junie auto-unlocks upon Rocket Pass Premium purchase. Later in the Pass, unlock Magnifique and Magnifique GXT to add some magnificent sports cars to your collection. Rocket Pass Premium includes items inspired by French duo Daft Punk as well!

Heatseeker — it’s a mode all about pursuit, and it’ll have a Ranked version for the first time! From December 10 to December 17, complete Ranked Heatseeker Quests in the Bring the Heat event to unlock Drops and the Fire Eye Topper. 

https://www.xbox.com/games/store/rocket-league/C125W9BG2K0V

author: Xbox
description:
This week we fight amongst the stars in Marvel Cosmic Invasion, journey through Ohio in Fallout 76: Burning Springs, and rewind back to the 90s in Lost Records: Bloom & Rage. Let’s jump in!

title: Explore Burning Springs & Fight Amongst the Stars | This Week on Xbox

description:
Rise once more, Nightfarers… The Night is not through with you yet.

ELDEN RING NIGHTREIGN The Forsaken Hollows is available now.

Key features of The Forsaken Hollows:

- Two new Nightfarers: The Scholar and the Undertaker

- New Shifting Earth: The Great Hollows

- New bosses

- New Points of Interest
